reviewText: Good co cert video for any generation!
Love this dvd!!!!!!! Great acts, great songs, great memories!

Since I purchased this for my son (David is 36) for the Holidays, it's been non-stop, doin' the bump (I had to teach him)--my hips still ache--LOL! WOW, what memories...the words came back to me, the fashions--well, what can I say.  To David, the songs that he hears on commercials, or the Time-Life Music commercials, etc. are still blowing his mind. Thank you Amazon, for helping both of us "dance away those pounds"!
i bought it for a friend of mine and he seems to be enjoying it. brought back good memories of his younger years.
